thread.title: Steve Harvey can now relax:hi is no longer the biggest award show flubber
thread.title_full: Steve Harvey can now relax:hi is no longer the biggest award show flubber

author: Makeda Easter
title: Steve Harvey can now relax:hi is no longer the biggest award show flubber
text:
Feb. 27, 2017, 12:03 a.m. Steve Harvey can now relax:hi is no longer the biggest award show flubber Makeda Easter Steve Harvey holds up the card showing the winners after he incorrectly announced Miss Colombia Ariadna Gutierrez at the winner at the 2015 Miss Universe pageant (John Locher / AP) 
Move over Steve Harvey, Faye Dunaway and Warren Beatty now the hold the "world's biggest awards show snafu award." 
The "Bonnie and Clyde" co-stars were the unfortunate presenters who, reading from an incorrect card, mistakenly awarded "La La Land" the Oscar for best picture when "Moonlight" had won. 
"This is very unfortunate what happened," host Jimmy Kimmel said, attempting to contain the situation. "Personally, I blame Steve Harvey for this." 
And indeed, it seemed a reprise of 2015 Miss Universe pageant. when Harvey, the host, erroneously announced the winner as Miss Colombia, Ariadna Gutierrez, over the pageant's true winner, Miss Philippines, Pia Wurtzbach. 
Social media reaction was swift, with even the Miss Universe organization chiming in. 
Unfortunately, unlike the Miss Universe pageant, the Academy Awards draws the biggest live audience in the U.S. after the Super Bowl. Dunaway and Beatty's gaffe was seen live by tens of millions of viewers, and heaven knows how many others via online videos and, of course, Twitter. Latest updates
